title: Longevity and efficacy of lanthanum-based P remediation under changing dissolved oxygen availability in a small eutrophic lake.
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3EM00572K, Paper
Wessam Neweshy, Dolors Planas, Nicole K Sanderson, Raoul-Marie Couture
We set out to study the seasonal variations in phosphorus (P) mobility in the sediment of a small eutrophic lake that has been treated with lanthanum-modified bentonite (LMB) and to...
